What Is MeRing?

MeRing is an IoT product which stands for Medical Evaluation Ring. The main purpose of this product is to keep track of High-Risk groups, As well as elderly people who live alone.

{" "}

Why?

In our modern world, where we have a lot of Medical technologies and a treatment for most of health problems and diseases, we quite forget about people who are old aged.

Old aged people frequently don’t have the energy or the patience to seek medical treatments for their own good, and that’s where our problem starts.

In today’s era we have a lot of old aged population, as for 2019 we had 605 Million people of age of 65 and above and even more for 2020 (727 Million), this population often get sick or need treatment as soon as possible and very often visit Medical Clinics may it be from the minorest reason to a high life threatening reason.

People who live solitary lives, often don’t have any family member to take care of them nor call an ambulance if needed, and often refuse to get a treatment may it be from stubborness or by thinking “it will pass”.

); }; export default About;
